headline: Google under EU investigation for data privacy issues in Gemini AI model
summary: The European Commission launched an investigation into Google's Gemini AI citing concerns over data collection and transparency.

headline: Apple reports record Q3 earnings beating Wall Street expectations
summary: Apple posted a 12% year-over-year revenue increase driven by strong iPhone sales and growth in subscription services.

headline: Amazon partners with Rivian to deploy new fleet of electric delivery vans
summary: Amazon signed a strategic partnership with Rivian to add 10,000 new EVs to its logistics fleet by 2026.

headline: Microsoft launches Copilot Studio to let enterprises customize AI tools
summary: Microsoft introduced a new developer toolkit, Copilot Studio, enabling businesses to tailor AI copilots for specific workflows.

headline: Tesla issues software update for Model Y infotainment system
summary: Tesla rolled out a routine update improving connectivity and adding new interface features for Model Y vehicles.

headline: Nvidia acquires AI startup DeepCore Labs to strengthen GPU cloud platform
summary: Nvidia announced the acquisition of DeepCore Labs, a leading AI infrastructure firm, to expand its enterprise GPU offerings.

headline: Intel stock jumps after analysts upgrade rating amid chip recovery hopes
summary: Goldman Sachs upgraded Intel’s stock from ‘Neutral’ to ‘Buy’, citing strong AI chip demand forecasts for 2026.

headline: Meta announces $5B stock buyback to restore investor confidence
summary: Meta’s board approved a $5B share repurchase plan as ad revenue growth shows early signs of slowing.

headline: AMD unveils new Ryzen AI 9000 processors for next-gen laptops
summary: AMD introduced its Ryzen AI 9000 series with improved neural processing units and better energy efficiency.

headline: Broadcom CEO comments on semiconductor market stabilization
summary: Broadcom CEO Hock Tan noted signs of supply chain normalization and steady enterprise chip demand for 2026.
